hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: When any of you hears the summons to prayer while he has a vessel in his hand, he should not lay it down till he fulfils his need

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَسْمَعُ النِّدَاءَ وَالإِنَاءُ عَلَى يَدِهِ
chapter.eng-name: A Man Who Hears The Call While A Vessel Is In His Hand
